instruction: How did the researchers analyze the spatial and temporal dynamics of urbanization and cropland in the Nile Delta between 2007 and 2017 using big time series data from remotely sensed satellite images and the random forests classifier?

instruction: Can the random forests classifier and big time series data from remotely sensed satellite images be considered superior to traditional methods for analyzing the spatial and temporal dynamics of urbanization and cropland in the Nile Delta between 2007 and 2017?
